verses.verse: Why do the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H7283>rage<s%>, and the <S%H3816>people<s%> <S%H1897>imagine<s%> a vain <S%H7385>thing<s%>?

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3320>set<s%> <S%H7336>themselves<s%>, and the rulers take <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and against his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, saying,
Let us <S%H5423>break<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> <S%H5423>asunder<s%>, and cast <S%H7993>away<s%> their cords from <S%H5688>us<s%>.
He that <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%>: the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have them in <S%H3932>derision<s%>.
Then shall he <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, and <S%H926>trouble<s%> them in his severe <S%H2740>displeasure<s%>.
Yet have I <S%H5258>set<s%> my <S%H4428>king<s%> upon my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H2706>decree<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, You are my Son; this <S%H3117>day<s%> have I fathered <S%H3205>you<s%>.

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> of <S%H5414>me<s%>, and I shall give you the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and the outermost <S%H657>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for your <S%H272>possession<s%>.
You shall <S%H7489>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>; you shall dash them in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> like a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.
Be <S%H7919>wise<s%> now <S%H4428>therefore<s%>, O you kings: be <S%H3256>instructed<s%>, you <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

<S%H5401>Kiss<s%> the <S%H1248>Son<s%>, lest he be <S%H599>angry<s%>, and you <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%>, when his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H1197>kindled<s%> but a <S%H4592>little<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are all they that put their trust in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
